Address: 1280 WEST PEACHTREE ST. NW, ATLANTA, Georgia, 30309, United States of America
CompanyDescription: References in this Annual Report on Form 10-K to "Interface," "the Company," "we," "our," "ours" and "us" refer to Interface, Inc. and its subsidiaries or any of them, unless the context requires otherwise. Interface is a global flooring company specializing in carpet tile and resilient flooring, including luxury vinyl tile ("LVT") and rubber flooring. We help our customers create high-performance interior spaces that support well-being, productivity, and creativity, as well as the sustainability of the planet. We are a worldwide leader in design, production and sales of modular carpet, also known as carpet tile. As a global company with a reputation for high quality, reliability and premium positioning, we market modular carpet in over 110 countries under the established brand names Interface® and FLOR®. In 2017, we globally launched a line of LVT products, which represented our first introduction into a category of products that we call resilient flooring.  ... More ...
